      • list

        public java.util.ArrayList<Entity> list()
        Retrieve a (shallow) copy of this list. Especially useful in for loops. Avoids concurrent modification exceptions when adding/removing from this collection during iteration.
        Returns:
        a copy of the list underlying this collection
